problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD中,AB=4,BC=6,AB⊥BC,BC⊥CD,E为AD的中点,F为线段BE上的点,且FE=\frac{1}{3}BE,则点F到边CD的距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, AB ⊥ BC, BC ⊥ CD, E is the midpoint of AD, F is the point on the line segment BE, and FE=\frac{N_2}{N_3}BE, then point F is to edge CD The distance is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示,过E作EG⊥CD于G,过F作FH⊥CD于H,过E作EQ⊥BC于Q,则EG∥FH∥BC,AB∥EQ∥CD,四边形CHPQ是矩形,∵AB∥EQ∥CD,∴\frac{AE}{ED}=\frac{BQ}{QC},∵E是AD的中点,∴BQ=CQ=3,∴HP=CQ=3,∵FP∥BQ,∴\frac{EF}{EB}=\frac{FP}{BQ},∵FE=\frac{1}{3}BE,∴FP=\frac{1}{3}BQ=1,∴FH=1+3=4．故选:C．
